The Extended Integer (XInt) Library » Rationales

Okay, then why not make the developer provide one?

Ease-of-use, and the fact that for many developers, there's little need for cryptographically-secure random numbers. This way, those that need them can take a few simple steps to get them, and those that don't can just use the library as-is.
